com.konakart.al

Class ReviewMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakart.al.BaseMgr
      • com.konakart.al.ReviewMgr

  • public class ReviewMgr
extends BaseMgr
    Contains methods to read and write product reviews.

      • fetchReviews

        public com.konakart.appif.ReviewsIf fetchReviews(com.konakart.appif.DataDescriptorIf dd,
                                        com.konakart.appif.ReviewSearchIf rs)
                                          throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                                                 KKAppException
        Retrieves the reviews that match the criteria in a ReviewSearch object and puts them in the currentReviews array.
        Parameters:
        dd - Used to control the data offset, limit the number of items returned and set the sort order
        rs - Contains information used to search for reviews
        Returns:
        Returns a Reviews object
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException
        KKAppException

      • navigateCurrentReviews

        public void navigateCurrentReviews(java.lang.String navDir,
                          long timestamp)
                            throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                                   KKAppException
        This method is called to navigate through a list of reviews when the list is longer than maxRows.
        navDir can take the following values which are retrieved using getter methods on the ReviewMgr instance:
        • getNavNext()
        • getNavBack()
        • getNavStart()
        Parameters:
        navDir - The navigation direction
        timestamp - Indicates when the result set was created.
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException
        KKAppException

      • orderCurrentReviews

        public void orderCurrentReviews(java.lang.String orderBy,
                       long timestamp)
                         throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                                KKAppException
        This method is called to change the order of a list of reviews in the currentReviews array. The orderBy parameter can take a range of values. The valid orderBy values are:
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED_DESCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED_ASCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_TIMES_READ
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_TIMES_READ_DESCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_TIMES_READ_ASCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_RATING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_RATING_DESCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_RATING_ASCENDING
        *
        Parameters:
        orderBy - The order by parameter
        timestamp - Indicates when the result set was created.
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException
        KKAppException

      • orderCurrentVendorReviews

        public void orderCurrentVendorReviews(java.lang.String orderBy,
                             long timestamp)
                               throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                                      KKAppException
        This method is called to change the order of a list of reviews in the currentReviews array. The orderBy parameter can take a range of values. The valid orderBy values are:
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED_DESCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_DATE_ADDED_ASCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_TIMES_READ
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_TIMES_READ_DESCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_TIMES_READ_ASCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_RATING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_RATING_DESCENDING
        • DataDescConstants.ORDER_BY_RATING_ASCENDING
        *
        Parameters:
        orderBy - The order by parameter
        timestamp - Indicates when the result set was created.

        com.konakart.app.KKException
        KKAppException

      • filterCurrentReviews

        public void filterCurrentReviews(int rating,
                        long timestamp)
                          throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                                 KKAppException
        The current reviews are filtered by rating. If the rating filter is already set, then it is reset.
        Parameters:

        timestamp -

      • fetchReviewDetails

        public void fetchReviewDetails(int revId)
                        throws com.konakart.app.KKException,
                               KKAppException
        Sets selectedReview by finding it within the currentReviews array. It throws an exception if the review cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        revId - The id of the selected review
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException
        KKAppException

      • truncateDesc

        public java.lang.String truncateDesc(java.lang.String desc,
                            int wordLength,
                            int stringLength)
        Format the description in order to truncate it and to split up very long words which could ruin the page formatting. If stringLength is set to zero, then it only truncates long words and doesn't truncate the string. If the description supplied is null, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        desc - The description to be formatted
        wordLength - The maximum word length
        stringLength - The maximum string length
        Returns:
        Return a truncated description

      • getNumberOfReviews

        public int getNumberOfReviews()

        Returns:
        Returns the number of reviews currently retrieved.

      • writeReview

        public int writeReview(java.lang.String _reviewText,
              int rating,
              int customerId,
              int productId,
              int vendorId)
                throws com.konakart.app.KKException
        Save a review in the database.
        Parameters:
        _reviewText - the text to put into the review
        rating - the rating for the review
        customerId - id of the customer writing the review
        productId - id of the product
        vendorId - id of the vendor
        Returns:
        returns the id of the review that was created
        Throws:
        com.konakart.app.KKException

      • setPageSize

        public void setPageSize(int num)
        Used to set a user defined maximum number of reviews displayed on a page. When set to a number greater than zero, this value is used instead of the value in the configuration variable MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_REVIEWS.
        Parameters:
        num -

      • getPageSize

        public int getPageSize()
        Used to get the maximum number of reviews to display. The value is customizable by the customer.
        Returns:
        Returns the maximum number of reviews to display
